SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Command
The Command interface defines the structure for all commands in the editor.
CommandOriginator
The CommandOriginator interface combines the functionalities of the Command and Originator interfaces.
CopyCommand
The CopyCommand class encapsulates the logic for copying selected text from the editor.
CutCommand
The CutCommand class encapsulates the logic for cuting selected text from the editor.
DeleteCommand
The DeleteCommand class encapsulates the logic for deleting selected text in the editor.
Editor
The Editor class is the entry point for the text editor application.
EditorMemento
The EditorMemento class is an implementation of the Memento interface.
Engine
Main API for the text editing engine
EngineImpl
Implementation of the Engine interface for a text editor.
InsertCommand
The InsertCommand class encapsulates the logic for inserting text into the editor.
InsertMemento
The InsertMemento class is a concrete implementation of the Memento interface used to store the state of the text that is about to be inserted.
Invoker
The Invoker class is responsible for managing and executing both originator and concrete commands.
Memento
The Memento interface is a marker interface used to represent a memento object in the Memento design pattern.
Originator
This interface represents the Originator in the Memento design pattern.
Pair<CommandOriginator,Memento>
A generic class that encapsulates a pair consisting of a CommandOriginator and its corresponding Memento.
PasteCommand
The PasteCommand class encapsulates the logic for pasting selected text from the editor.
Recorder
This interface defines the Recorder in the Command pattern with Memento.
RecorderImpl
Implementation of the Recorder interface for recording and replaying command execution sequences along with their states (mementos).
RedoCommand
The RedoCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for executing the redo action within the application.
ReplayCommand
The ReplayCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for replaying the recorded actions from the recorder.
Selection
Provides access to selection control operations
SelectionCommand
The SelectionCommand class encapsulates the logic for updating a text selection.
SelectionImpl
Implementation of the Selection interface, representing a selection in the buffer.
SelectMemento
The SelectMemento class is a concrete implementation of the Memento interface used to store the state of a text selection within the editor.
StartCommand
The StartCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for starting the recording process in the Recorder.
StopCommand
The StopCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for stopping the recording process in the Recorder.
TextualInterface
The TextualInterface class represents a simple command-line interface (CLI) for interacting with the text editor.
UndoCommand
The UndoCommand class implements the Command interface and is responsible for executing the undo action within the application.
UndoManager
Manages undo and redo functionality by maintaining a history of states (mementos) for an editor.
